forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low around 55F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 59F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High near 15C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 16C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 59F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.
